juzs.text: ye log kis cheez ke baare mein poch gach kar rahe hai
us badi qabar ke mutaalliq
jis ke baare mein ye eqtelaaf kar rahe hai
yaqinan ye abhi jaan lenge
phir bil yaqeen unhe bahuth jald maaloom ho jayega
kya hum ne zameen ko farsh nahi banaya
aur pahaado ko meqe (nahi banaya)
aur hum ne tumhe joda joda paida kiya
aur hum ne tumhaari neend ko araam ka sabab banaya
aur raath ko hum ne parda banaya hai
aur din ko hum ne waqt rozgaar banaya
aur tumhaare upar hum ne saath mazbooth asmaan banaaye
aur ek chamakta hoa roushan chiraagh (suraj) paida kiya
aur badhliyo se hum ne ba kasrath behta hoa paani barsaaya
ta ke us se anaaj aur sabza ugaaye
aur ghane baagh (bhi ugaaye)
beshak faisle ke din ka waqth muqarrar hai
jis din ke soor mein phuka jayega, phir tum fauj dar fauj chale aoge
aur asmaan khol diya jayega, to us mein darwaaze darwaaze ho jayenge
aur pahaad chalaaye jayenge, pas wo saraab1 ho jayenge
beshak dozakh ghaath mein hai
sarkasho ka thikaana wahi hai
us mein wo muddato tak pade rahenge
na kabhi us mein khanki ka maza chakenge na paani ka
sivaaye garam paani aur (behti) peep ke
(un ko) pura pura badhla milega
unhe to hisaab ki tawaqqe hee na thi
aur be baaki se hamaari aayato ki takzeeb karte thein
hum ne har ek cheez ko likh kar shumaar kar rakha hai
ab tum (apne kiye ka) maza chako, hum tumhaara azaab hee badaate rahenge
yaqinan parhezgaar logo ke liye kamyaabi hai
baghaath hai aur angoor hai
aur nau jawaan kuwaari hum umr aurte hai
aur chalakte hoye jaam sharaab hai
wahaa na to wo be huda baatein sunenge aur na jhoti batein sunenge
(un ko) tere rab ki taraf se (un ke nek amaal ka) ye badhla milega jo kaafi inaam hoga

(us rab ki taraf se milega jo ke) asmaano ka aur zameen ka aur jo kuch un ke darmiyaan hai, un ka parvardigaar hai aur badi baqshish karne waala hai, kisi ko us se baath cheeth karne ka eqtiyaar nahi hoga
jis din ruh aur farishte sa-fe baandh kar khade honge, to koyi kalaam na kar sakega, magar jise rahmaan ijaazath de de aur wo theek baath zabaan se nikaale
ye din haq hai, ab jo chaahe apne rab ke paas (nek amaal kar ke) thikaana bana le
hum ne tumhe an-qareeb aane waale azaab se dara diya (aur chaukanna kar diya) hai, jis din insaan apne haatho ki kamaayi ko dekh lega aur kaafir kahega ke kaash! main mitthi ho jaata
doob kar saqti se khinchne waalo ki qasam
bandh khol kar chohda dene waalo ki qasam
aur teerne phirne waalo ki qasam
phir daud kar aage badne waalo ki qasam
phir kaam ki tadhbeer karne waalo ki qasam
jis din kaampne wali kaampegi
us ke baadh ek piche aane waali, piche piche ayegi
(bahuth se) dil us din dhadakte honge
jin ki nigaahe nichi hongi
kehte hai ke kya hum pehle ki si haalath ki taraf lautaaye jayenge
kya us waqt, jab ke hum bosida haddiyaa ho jaayenge
kehte hai ke phir to ye lautna nuqsaandah hai
(maloom hona chahiye) wo to sirf ek (khauf naak) daant hai
ke (jis ke zaaher hote hee) wo ek dam maidaan mein jama ho jayenge
kya Mosa(alaihissallaam) ki qabar tumhe pahonchi hai
jab ke unhe un ke rab ne paak maidaan tua mein pukaara
(ke) tum feraun ke paas jaao, us ne sarkashi eqtiyaar karli hai
us se kaho ke kya to apni durustgi aur islaah chahta hai
aur ye ke main tujhe tere rab ki raah dikhaao, ta ke tu (us se) darne lage
pas ose badi nishaani dikhaayi
to us ne jhutlaaya aur na farmaani ki
phir palta daud dhoop karte hoye
phir sab ko jama kar ke pukaara
tum sab ka rab main hee hoon
to (sab se bulandh wa baala) Allah ne bhi ose aaqirath ke aur dunya ke azaab mein giraftaar kar liya
beshak is mein us shaqs ke liye ibrath hai jo da-re
kya tumhaara paida karna zyaada dushwaar hai ya asmaan ka? Allah ta’ala ne ose banaya
us ki bulandi oonchi ki, phir ose theek thaak kar diya
us ki raath ko tareek banaaya aur us ke din ko nikaala
aur us ke baadh zameen ko hamwaar bhicha diya
us mein se paani aur chaara nikaala
aur pahaado ko (mazbooth) gaad diya
ye sab tumhaare aur tumhaare jaanwaro ke fayde ke liye hai
pas jab wo badi aafath (qayaamath) aa jayegi
jis din ke insaan apne kiye hoye kaamo ko yaad karega
aur (har) dekhne waale ke saamne jahannam zaaher ki jayegi
to jis (shaqs) ne sarkashi ki (hogi)
aur dunyaawi zindagi ko tarjih di (hogi)
us ka thikaana jahannam hee hai
haan jo shaqs apne rab ke saamne khade hone se darta raha hoga aur apne nafs ko qaahish se roka hoga
to us ka thikaana jannath hee hai
log aap se qayaamath ke waaqe hone ka waqt daryaaft karte hai
aap ko us ke bayaan karne se kya talluq
us ke ilm ki inteha to Allah ki jaanib hai
aap to sirf us se darte rehne waalo ko agaah karne waale hai
jis roz ye ose dekh lenge, to aisa maloom hoga ke sirf din ka aaqri hissa ya awwal hissa hee (dunya mein) rahe hai
wo tursh ro hoa aur mu mod liya
(sirf is liye) ke us ke paas ek naabina ayaa
tujhe kya qabar shaayad wo sawar jaata
yaani nasihath sunta aur ose nasihath fayda pahonchati
jo be-parvaahi karta hai
us ki taraf to, tu puri tawajjeh karta hai
halaan ke us ke na sawarne se tujh par koyi ilzaam nahi
aur jo shaqs tere paas daudta hoa ata hai
aur wo dar (bhi) raha hai
tu us se to be-rokhi baratta hai
ye theek nahi, Qur’aan to nasihath (ki cheez) hai
jo chaahe us se nasihath le
(ye to) pur azmath sahifo mein (hai)
jo bulandh wa baala aur paak saaf hai
aise likhne waalo ke haatho mein hai
jo buzrug aur paak baaz hai
Allah ki maar insaan par, kaisa na shukra hai
ise Allah ne kis cheez se paida kiya
(ose) ek nutfe se, phir andaaze par rakha us ko
phir us ke liye raasta asaan kiya
phir ose mauth di aur phir qabar mein dafan kiya
phir jab chaahega ose zinda kar dega
har giz nahi, us ne ab tak Allah ke hukm ki baja aawari nahi ki
insaan ko chahiye ke apne khaane ko dekhe
ke hum ne qoob paani barsaaya
phir phaada zameen ko acchi tarah
phir us mein se anaaj ugaaye
aur angoor aur tarkaari
aur zaytoon aur khajoor
aur gunjaan baghaath
aur mewa aur (ghaas) chaara bhi ugaaya
tumhaare istemaal wa fayde ke liye, tumhaare chau paayo ke liye
pas jab ke kaan behre kar dene waali (qayaamath) aa jayegi
us din aadmi apne bhai se
aur apni maa aur apne baap se
aur apni biwi aur apni aulaad se bhaagega
un mein se har ek ko us din aisi fikr daaman geer hogi, jo us ke liye kaafi hogi
us din bahuth se chehre roushan honge
(jo) haste hoye aur hashaash bashaash honge
aur bahuth se chehre us din ghubaar aaloodh honge
jin par siyaahi chadi hoyi hogi
wahi kaafir badh kirdaar log honge
jab suraj lapet liya jayega
aur jab sitaare be-noor ho jayenge
aur jab pahaad chalaaye jayenge
aur jab das maah ki haamela oontniya chohd di jaaye
aur jab wehshi jaanwar ekhatte kiye jayenge
aur jab samandar bhadkaaye jayenge
aur jab jaane (jismo) se mila di jayegi
aur jab zinda gaadi hoyi ladki se sawaal kiya jayega
ke kis gunaah ki wajeh se wo qatl ki gayi
aur jab naame amaal khol diye jayenge
aur jab asmaan ki khaal utaar li jayegi
aur jab jahannam bhadkaayi jayegi
aur jab jannath nazdeek kardi jayegi
to us din har shaqs jaan lega, jo kuch le kar ayaa hoga
main qasam khaata hoon, piche hatne waale
chalne phirne waale, chupne waale sitaaro ki
aur raath ki jab jaane lage
aur subaah ki jab chamakne lage
yaiqnan ye ek buzrug rasool ka kaha hoa hai
jo quwwath waala hai, arsh waale (Allah) ke nazdeek bulandh martaba hai
jis ki (asmaano mein) ita’ath ki jaati hai, ameen hai
aur tumhaara saathi deewaana nahi hai
us ne us (farishte) ko asmaan ke khule kinaare par dekha bhi hai
aur ye ghayb ki baatho ko batlaane mein baqeel bhi nahi
aur ye Qur’aan shaytaan mardoodh ka kalaam nahi
phir tum kahaa jaa rahe ho
ye to tamaam jahaan waalo ke liye nasihath naama hai
(bil qusoos) us ke liye, jo tum mein se sidhi raah par chalna chaahe
aur tum baghayr parvardigaare aalam ke chaahe, kuch nahi chaah sakte
jab asmaan phat jayega
aur jab sitaare jhad jayenge
aur jab samandar beh niklenge
aur jab qabre (shaq) kar ke ukhaad di jayengi
(us waqt) har shaqs apne aage bheje hoye aur piche chohde hoye (yaani agle pichle amaal) ko maloom kar lega
aye insaan! tujhe apne rabbe kareem se kis cheez ne behkaaya
jis (rab ne) tujhe paida kiya, phir theek thaak kiya, phir durust aur baraabar banaaya
jis surath mein chaaha tujhe jod diya
har giz nahi, balke tum to jaza wa saza ke din ko jhutlaate ho
yaqinan tum par nigehbaan izzath waale
likhne waale muqarrar hai
jo kuch tum karte ho, wo jaante hai
yaqinan nek log (jannath ke aysh wa araam aur) nemato mein honge
aur yaqinan badhkaar log dozakh mein honge
badhle waale din us mein jayenge
wo us se kabhi ghaayab na hone payenge
tujhe kuch qabar bhi hai, ke badhle ka din kya hai
main phir (kehta hoon ke) tujhe kya maloom ke jaza (aur saza) ka din kya hai
(wo hai) jis din koyi shaqs kisi shaqs ke liye, kisi cheez ka muqtaar na hoga aur (tamaam tar) ehkaam, us roz Allah ke hee honge
badi qaraabi hai naap tool mein kami karne waalo ki
ke jab logo se naap kar lete hai to pura pura lete hai
aur jab unhe naap kar ya tool kar dete hai to kam dete hai
kya unhe apne marne ke baadh ji uthne ka qayaal nahi
us azeem din ke liye
jis din sab log rabbul aalameen ke saamne khade honge
yaqinan badh kaaro ka naame amaal sijjiyyeen mein hai
tujhe kya maloom sijjiyyeen kya hai
(ye to) likhi hoyi kitaab hai
us din jhutlaane waalo ki badi qaraabi hai
jo jaza wa saza ke din ko jhutlaate rahe
ose sirf wahi jhutlaata hai, jo hadh se aage nikal jaane waala (aur) gunehgaar hota hai
jab us ke saamne hamaari aayate padi jaati hai to keh deta hai ke ye aglo ke afsaane hai
yo nahi, balke un ke dilo par un ke amaal ki wajeh se zang (chad gaya) hai
har giz nahi, ye log us din apne rab se oot1 mein rakhe jayenge
phir ye log bil yaqeen jahannam mein jhonke jayenge
phir keh diya jayega, yahi hai wo, jise tum jhutlaate rahe
yaqinan yaqinan, neko kaaro ka naame amaal, illiyyeen mein hai
tujhe kya pata ke illiyyeen kya hai
(wo to) likhi hoyi kitaab hai
muqarrab (farishte) us ka mushaa’heda karte hai
yaqinan nek log (badi) nemato mein honge
masehriyo par baithe dekh rahe honge
tu un ke chehro se hee nemato ki taro taazgi pehchaan lega
ye log sar ba muhar qaalis sharaab pilaaya jayenge
jis par mushk ki muhar hogi, sabqath le jaane waalo ko isi mein sabqath karni chahiye
aur us ki aamezish tasneem ki hogi
(yaani) wo chashma jis ka paani muqarrab log piyenge
gunehgaar log imaan waalo ki hasi udaaya karte thein
aur un ke paas se guzarte hoye, aapas mein aankh ke ishaare karte thein
aur jab apne waalo ki taraf lauthte, to dil lagiyaa karte thein
aur jab unhe dekhte to kehte yaqinan ye log gumraah (be-raah) hai
ye un par paas baan bana kar to nahi bheje gaye
pas aaj imaan waale un kaafiro par hasenge
taqto par baithe dekh rahe honge
ke ab un munkiro ne jaisa ye karte thein, pura pura badhla pa liya
jab asmaan phat jayega
aur apne rab ke hukm par kaan lagaayega aur osi ke laayeq wo hai
aur jab zameen (kheench kar) phaayla di jayegi
aur us mein jo hai ose wo ugal degi aur khaali ho jayegi
aur apne rab ke hukm par kaan lagayegi aur osi ke laayeq wo hai
aye insaan! tu apne rab se milne tak, ye koshish aur tamaam kaam, mehnate kar ke, us se mulaqaath karne wala hai
to (us waqt) jis shaqs ke daahne haath mein amaal naama diya jayega
us ka hisaab to badi asaani se liya jayega
aur wo apne ahal ki taraf hasi khushi laut ayega
haan jis shaqs ka amaal naama us ki peet ke piche se diya jayega
to wo mauth ko bulaane lagega
aur bhadakti hoyi jahannam mein dakhil hoga
ye shaqs apne mutaalleqeen mein (dunya mein) khush tha
us ka qayaal tha ke Allah ki taraf laut kar hee na jayega
kyo nahi, halaan ke us ka rab ose ba qoobi dekh raha tha
mujhe shafaq1 ki qasam! aur raath ki
aur us ki jama karda chizo ki qasam
aur chaandh ki jab ke wo, kaamil ho jaata hai
yaqinan tum ek haalath se dosri haalath par pahonchoge
unhe kya ho gaya hai ke imaan nahi laate
aur jab un ke paas Qur’aan pada jaata hai to sajda nahi karte
balke jinhone kufr kiya wo jhutla rahe hai
aur Allah ta’ala qoob jaanta hai, jo kuch ye dilo mein rakhte hai
unhe alm’naak azaabo ki khush qabri suna do
haan imaan waalo aur nek amaal waalo ko be’shumaar aur na qatam hone waala ajr hai
burujo waale asmaan ki qasam
waada kiye hoye din ki qasam
haazir hone waale aur haazir kiye gaye ki qasam
(ke) khandaqo waale halaak kiye gaye
wo ek aag thi indhan waali
jab ke wo log us ke aas paas baithe thein
aur musalmaano ke saath jo kar rahe thein, us ko apne saamne dekh rahe thein
ye log un musalmaano (ke kisi aur gunaah ka) badhla nahi le rahe thein sivaaye us ke, ke wo Allah ghaaleb laayeq hamdh ki zaath par imaan laaye thein
jis ke liye asmaan wa zameen ka milk(milkiyath) hai aur Allah ta’ala ke saamne hai har cheez
beshak jin logo ne musalmaan mardo aur aurto ko sataaya aur phir tauba (bhi) na ki to un ke liye jahannam ka azaab hai aur jalne ka azaab hai
beshak imaan qubool karne waalo aur nek kaam karne waalo ke liye, wo baghaath hai, jin ke niche nehre beh rahi hai, yahi badi kamyaabi hai
yaqinan tere rab ki pakad badi saqth hai
wahi pehli martaba paida karta hai aur wahi dobaara paida karega
wo bada baqshish karne waala aur bahuth muhabbath karne waala hai
arsh ka maalik azmath waala hai
jo chaahe ose kar guzarne waale hai
tujhe lashkaro ki qabar bhi mili hai
yaane feraun aur samoodh ki
(kuch nahi) balke kaafir to jhutlaane mein pade hoye hai
aur Allah ta’ala bhi unhe har taraf se ghere hoye hai
balke ye Qur’aan hai badi shaan waala
lauhe mehfooz mein (likh hoa)
qasam hai asmaan ki aur andhere mein roushan hone waale ki
tujhe maloom bhi hai ke wo raath ko namodaar hone waali cheez kya hai
wo roushan sitaara hai
koyi aisa nahi, jis par nigehbaan farishta na ho
insaan ko dekhna chahiye ke wo kis cheez se paida kiya gaya hai
wo ek uchalte paani se paida kiya gaya hai
jo peet aur sine ke darmiyaan se nikalta hai
beshak wo ise pher laane par yaqinan khudrath rakhne waala hai
jis din poshida bhedho ki jaanch padtaal hogi
to na hoga us ke paas kuch zoor na madadgaar
baarish waale asmaan ki qasam
aur phatne waale zameen ki qasam
beshak ye (Qur’aan) albatta do tok faisla karne waala kalaam hai
ye hasi ki (aur be fayeda) baath nahi
albatta kaafir daao ghaath mein hai
aur main bhi ek chaal chal raha hoon
tu kaafiro ko muhallath de, inhe thode dino chohd de
apne bahuth hee bulandh Allah ke naam ki paakizgi bayaan kar
jis ne paida kiya aur sahih saalim banaya
aur jis ne (theek thaak) andaaza kiya aur phir raah dikhaayi
aur jis ne taaza ghaans paida ki
phir us ne is ko (sukha kar) siyaah koda kar diya
hum tujhe padayenge, phir tu na bhulega
magar jo kuch Allah chaahe, wo zaaher aur poshida ko jaanta hai
hum aap ke liye asaani paida kar denge
to aap nasihath karte rahe, agar nasihath kuch fayda de
darne waala to nasihath le ga
(haan) badh baqth us se gurez karega
jo badi aag mein jayega
jahaan phir na wo marega na jiyega (balke haalate niza mein pada rahega)
beshak us ne falaah paayi jo paak ho gaya
aur jis ne apne rab ka naam yaad rakha aur namaaz padta raha
lekin tum to dunya ki zindagi ko tarjih dete ho
aur aaqirath bahuth behtar aur bahuth baqa waali hai
ye baatein pehli kitaabo mein bhi hai
(yaani) Ibraheem(alaihissalaam) aur Mosa(alaihissalaam) ki kitaabo mein
kya tujhe bhi chupa lene waale (qayaamath) ki qabar pahonchi hai
us din bahuth se chehre zaleel honge
(aur) mehnath karne waale thake hoye honge
wo dehekti hoyi aag mein jayenge
aur nihaayath garam chashme ka paani un ko pilaaya jayega
un ke liye sivaaye kaante daar daraqto ke aur kuch khaana na hoga
jo na mota karega na bhook mitaayega
bahuth se chehre us din taro taaza aur (aasoda haal) honge
apni koshish par khush honge
bulandh wa baala jannato mein honge
jahaan koyi be huda baath nahi sunenge
jahaan behta hoa chashma hoga
(aur) us mein oonche oonche taqth honge
aur aab-qoore rakhe hoye (honge)
aur ek qataar mein lage hoye takiye honge
aur maqmali masnate phaili padi hongi
kya ye oonto ko nahi dekhte ke wo kis tarah paida kiye gaye hai
aur asmaan ko, ke kis tarah ooncha kiya gaya hai
aur pahaado ki taraf ke kis tarah gaad diye gaye hai
aur zameen ki taraf ke kis tarah bhichaayi gayi hai
pas aap nasihath kar diya kare (kyo ke) aap sirf nasihath karne waale hai
aap kuch in par daarogha nahi hai
haan! jo shaqs ru-gardaani kare aur kufr kare
ose Allah ta’ala bahuth bada azaab dega
beshak hamaari taraf un ka lautna hai
phir beshak hamaare zimme hai, un se hisaab lena
qasam hai fajr ki
aur das raatho ki
aur jufth1 aur taaq2 ki
aur raath ki jab wo chalne lage
kya in mein aqal mandh ke waaste kaafi qasam hai
kya aap ne nahi dekha ke aap ke rab ne aadiyo ke saath kya kiya
sutuno waale iram ke saath
jis ki maanindh (koyi khaum) mulko mein paida nahi ki gayi
aur samodiyo ke saath, jinhone waadi mein bade bade patthar taraashe thein
aur feraun ke saath jo meqo waala tha
in sabo ne shahro mein sar utha rakha tha
aur bahuth fasaad macha rakha tha
aaqir tere rab ne in sab par azaab ka koda barsaaya
yaqinan tera rab ghaath mein hai
insaan (ka ye haal hai ke) jab ose us ka rab azmaata hai, aur izzath wa nemath deta hai, to wo kehne lagta hai ke mere rab ne mujhe izzath daar banaaya
aur jab wo us ko azmaata hai, us ki rozi tang kar deta hai, to kehne lagta hai ke mere rab ne meri ihaanath ki (aur zaleel kiya)
aisa hargiz nahi, balke (baath ye hai) ke tum (hee) log yatimo ki izzath nahi karte
aur miskino ke khilaane ki ek dosre ko targheeb nahi dete
aur (murdo ki) miraas samet samet kar khaate ho
aur maal ko ji bhar kar azeez rakhte ho
yaqinan jis waqt zameen koot koot kar baraabar kardi jayegi
aur tera rab (khud) aa jayega aur farishte sa-fe baandh kar (aa jayenge)
aur jis din jahannam bhi laayi jayegi, us din insaan ko samajh ayegi, magar aaj us ke samjahne ka fayda kahaa
wo kahega ke kaash ke main ne apni is zindagi ke liye kuch peshgi samaan kiya hota
pas aaj Allah ke azaab jaisa azaab kisi ka na hoga
na us ki khaid wa bandh jaisi kisi ki khaid wa bandh hogi
aye itmenaan waali ruh
tu apne rab ki taraf laut chal, is tarah ke tu us se raazi, wo tujh se khush
pas mere qaas bandho mein daakhil hoja
aur meri jannath mein chali ja
main us shahar ki qasam khaata hoon
aur aap us shahar mein muqeem hai
aur (qasam hai) insaani baap aur aulaad ki
yaqinan hum ne insaan ko (badi) mashaqqath mein paida kiya hai
kya ye gumaan karta hai, ke ye kisi ke bas mein hee nahi
kehta (phirta) hai ke main ne to bahuth kuch maal qarch kar daala
kya (yo) samajhta hai ke, kisi ne ose dekha (hee) nahi
kya hum ne us ki do aankhe nahi banaayi
aur zabaan aur hoont (nahi banaaye)
hum ne dikha diye, us ko duno raaste
so us se na ho saka ke ghaati mein daakhil hota
aur kya samjha ke ghaati hai kya
kisi gardan (ghulaam, laundi) azaad karna
ya bhook waale din khaana khilaana
kisi rishtedaar yateem ko
ya qaak saar miskeen ko
phir un logo mein se ho jaata jo imaan laate aur ek dosre ko sabr ki aur rahem karne ki wasiyath karte hai
yahi log hai daaye baazo waale (khush baqti waale)
aur jin logo ne hamaari aayato ke saath kufr kiya, ye kam-baqti waale hai
in hee par aag hogi jo chaaro taraf se ghiri hoyi hogi
qasam hai suraj ki aur us ki dhoop ki
qasam hai chaandh ki jab us ke piche aaye
qasam hai din ki jab suraj ko numaaya kare
